==

##
META_DONNEE_ECRAN
==

REF_DONNEE_ECRAN
==

REF_GROUPE_DONNEES_INFO
==

##
META_GROUPE_DONNEES
==

##
REF_REGLEGESTION_DESC
==

##
META_REGLEGESTION
==

##
REF_REGLEGESTION
==

==

##
REF_REGLEGESTION_DESC
==
DELETE FROM REF_REGLEGESTION_DESC WHERE ID_REGLEGESTION IN ('RD_AFF_VAL_LIB_PRIME1','RD_AFF_VAL_LIB_PRIME2','RD_AFF_VAL_LIB_PRIME3','RD_AFF_VAL_LIB_PRIME4','RD_AFF_VAL_LIB_PRIME5','RD_PRIMES_CTRL_DIFF','RD_VALO_LIBELLE_PRIME1','RD_VALO_LIBELLE_PRIME2','RD_VALO_LIBELLE_PRIME3','RD_VALO_LIBELLE_PRIME4','RD_VALO_LIBELLE_PRIME5') AND COMPANY_ID='*'
##

META_DONNEE_GENERALE
==

##
REF_REGLEGESTION_DESC
==

##

==

##
REF_REGLEGESTION_DESC
==
DELETE FROM REF_REGLEGESTION_DESC WHERE ID_REGLEGESTION IN ('RD_CTRL_DSFSUS_PROLONG','RD_VALO_DONNEES_MISE_SUSP','RD_WKF_MODIF_CONTRACT_EVT_SUSP_RETOUR','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_ANC_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_AUGIND_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_AVNAT_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_AVTCDD_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_AVTCDI_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_AVTHOR_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_DSN_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_INDMOB_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_MOBINT_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_MUT_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_PERESS_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_PERPROB_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_PRIMES_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_PROMO_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_SUSP_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_TAD_DECOCHE','RD_WKF_MOD_CONTRACT_EVT_VEH_DECOCHE') AND COMPANY_ID='*'
##

##
META_REGLEGESTION
==

##
REF_DONNEE_ECRAN
==
DELETE FROM REF_DONNEE_ECRAN WHERE NOM_DONNEE IN ('CODETB','COMCNT','DATE_LIMITE_RETRO','DSA301','DSA302','DSCDDCDI','DSDCN','DSES2','DSFCN','DSFCNI','DSFCNP','DSFSUS','DSRNVL','EMPLOI','NIVECH','RD_NBJRS_TAD','RD_TXHOR','RVCNT','TCDDCDI','TRAV_DSSAD_OLD','TYPE_REEMBAUCHE_PREV','ZA380','ZA523','ZA700','ZA962','ZMODCNT','ZT061') AND NOM_PAGE IN ('RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFAFF','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFANC','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFAVNAT','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFCLA','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFDSN','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFHOR','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFINDTRP','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFMOBINT','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFPRIMES','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFREM','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFTAD','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFTYPCNT','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MODIFVEH','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_PER_ESSAI','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_PER_PROB','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_RENOUVCDD','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_SELECT','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_TRANSFOCDD','RD_WKF_MODIF_CONTRACT_HISTOS','RD_WKF_MOD_ANN_MODIF_CONTRACT_CHOIX','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_MISESUSP','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_PROLONGSUSP','RD_WKF_MODIF_CNT_REPSUSP') AND COMPANY_ID='*'
